title: Vegetable and rice stew
ingredients: ['1 aubergine, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '160g chopped onion', '5 cloves garlic, chopped', '90g basmati rice', '1 courgette, cut into large chunks', '1 large red pepper, chopped', '3 fresh tomatoes, diced', '250ml Marsala wine', '350ml water', '1/2 teaspoon salt or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chillies', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 sprig fresh rosemary, chopped']
